name: SSL - Secret Soviet Laboratory
description:
This game was made for BTP game jam #3 (The less is more)

A simple worker lingered in a secret underground laboratory and tries to get out, following the instructions of the dispatcher. However, the laboratory is fraught with many secrets that are not intended for outsiders. Price for the knowledge is death. 

Controls:

  1. Moving a character - WASD keys
  2. Move Camera - Mouse
  3. Interactions - E key

Made with Unreal Engine 4

Our team:

  • Code: xadzyki
  • 3D-art: demonvasya
  • Music and sound-design: ANTONY VISION
  • Game design and story: mikemebetter
